data.title: 140 Bio for WhatsApp Ideas
data.meta_description: Discover the best phrases to use in your bio for WhatsApp, and update your profile.
data.text:
Are you without inspiration to write your bio for WhatsApp? WhatsApp bio is a space to present yourself or your brand. You can talk a little bit about yourself or write a phrase that represents you.

For example, you can write a motivational, funny, or creative bio, it depends on the image you wish to transmit. Take a look at the article and select the bio for WhatsApp that suits your purposes the best!

Cool Bios for WhatsApp#

1 - Deal with the faults of others as gently as with your own.

2 - I received nothing I wanted, but I received everything I needed.

3 - Cherish your own emotions and never undervalue them.

4 - The past is gone; don’t leave with it.

5 - Being happy is self-responsibility; another human cannot fulfill that for you.

6 - Be enough for yourself first; the rest of the world can wait.

7 - Family…where life begins and love never ends.

8 - There is no elevator to success you have to take the stairs.

9 - The only difference between a good day and a bad day is your attitude.

10 - You’re not too old and it is not too late.

11 - Time is precious, waste it wisely.

12 - No one is always busy. It just depends on what number you are on their priority list.

13 - Aspire to inspire before we expire.

14 - Whatever you do, do it well.

15 - Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

16 - Hate comes from intimidation, love comes from appreciation.

17 - You can do anything but not everything.

18 - The secret to getting ahead is getting started.

19 - What holds you back isn’t what you are. It’s what you think you aren’t.

20 - Never make a permanent decision on temporary feelings.

Meaningful Bios for WhatsApp#

21 - Trust is a small word with a big concept.

22 - Start each day with a grateful heart.

23 - Challenges are what make life interesting.

24 - There’s bravery in being soft.

25 - Temporary people give you permanent lessons.

26 - Change the world by being yourself.

27 - Whatever you do in life, make sure it makes you happy.

28 - Why fit in when you were born to stand out.

29 - What feels like the end is often just the beginning.

30 - The best of me is yet to come.

31 - Sunsets are proof that endings can be beautiful too.

32 - In every situation, you’re the only one who gets to choose your attitude.

33 - Hope is the heartbeat of the soul.

34 - Live for the moments you can’t explain with words.

35 - The most important things in life aren’t things.

36 - When the roots are deep, there are no reasons to fear the wind.

37 - Sometimes we forget what we deserve because we are too busy listening to the noise of the world instead of our soul.

38 - I choose to make the rest of my life the best of my life!

39 - Different doesn’t mean wrong.

40 - Don’t let anyone dim your light.

Funny Bios for WhatsApp#

41 - Dear stress, let’s break up.

42 - Smiling is the best source to win hearts.

43 - Always hope, it's a spark of a great beginning.

44 - Smile and the world will smile back 😊

45 - Friends are the jewels of life!

46 - You have to be odd to be number one.

47 - Making peace with my broken pieces.

48 - Who am I? I have not found the answer yet.

49 - Life is a party. Dress like it!

50 - A joy shared is a joy doubled.

51 - Ask me no questions, and I’ll tell you no lies.

52 - Do more of what makes you happy.

53 - Comparison is the thief of joy.

54 - I don’t get older, I level up.

55 - Life without mistakes is like education without books.

56 - I’m too lazy to stop being lazy.

57 - I love my job when I’m on vacation.

58 - My messy hair doesn’t care.

59 - Divorce your ego.

60 - God is really creative; I mean, just look at me.

Motivational Bios for WhatsApp#

61 - Life is short. Spend it with people who make you laugh and feel loved.

62 - Live a life worth remembering.

63 - Life becomes clear when you start looking toward people’s hearts instead of their faces.

64 - Satisfy your soul, not society.

65 - Let your smile change the world, but don’t let the world change your smile.

66 - Don’t forget how badly you once wanted what you have now.

67 - One bad chapter doesn’t mean the end of the story.

68 - Life is not a competition. Each one is on their own journey. Live according to your choices, values, and principles.

69 - At the end of the day, I’m thankful that my blessings are bigger than my problems.

70 - Don’t give up. The beginning is always the hardest.

71 - People that make you smile on your worst days are so important.

72 - Let life surprise you.

73 - A good life is a collection of happy moments.

74 - It always seems impossible until it’s done.

75 - Be silent and let your success shout.

76 - Be the change that you wish to see in the world.

77 - Every moment is a fresh beginning.

78 -In teaching others we teach ourselves.

79 - If not me, who? If not now, when?

80 - All my focus is on the good.

Quotes for WhatsApp Bios#

81 - "The purpose of our lives is to be happy." (Dalai Lama)

82 - "Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans." (John Lennon)

83 - "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." (Mae West)

84 - "Turn your wounds into wisdom." (Oprah Winfrey)

85 - "The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain." (Dolly Parton)

86 - "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." (Albert Einstein)

87 - "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: It goes on." (Robert Frost)

88 - "Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears." (Les Brown)

89 - "When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go." (Carol Burnett)

90 - "Do not allow people to dim your shine because they are blinded. Tell them to put some sunglasses on." (Lady Gaga)

91 - "I'm not going to continue knocking on that old door that doesn't open for me. I'm going to create my own door and walk through that." (Ava DuVernay)

92 - "I care about decency and humanity and kindness. Kindness today is an act of rebellion." (Pink)

93 - "Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around." (Henry David Thoreau)

94 - "Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today." (Will Rogers)

95 - "Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championships." — Michael Jordan

96 - "Alone we can do so little, together we can do so much." (Helen Keller)

97 - "I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done." (Lucille Ball)

98 - "Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago." (Warren Buffet)

99 - "I will not lose, for even in defeat, there’s a valuable lesson learned, so it evens up for me." (Jay-Z)

100 - "I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to dance better than myself." (Arianna Huffington)

Short Bios for WhatsApp#

101 - Pray, Wait & Trust.

102 - Heal, learn, grow, and love.

103 - Better days are coming.

104 - Life has no CTRL+Z.

105 - Do everything in love.

106 - It’s okay not to be perfect.

107 - Born to express not to impress.

108 - Love conquers all things.

109 - Imperfectly perfect.

110 - Don’t just exist, live!

111- Seize the day,

112 - Work in progress.

113 - Escape the ordinary.

114 - Smile, you made it.

115 - Follow your dreams.

116 - Under construction.

117 - Love has no limits.

118 - Let it go and let it be,

119 - Happy days are here again.

120 - Be happy, live free.

WhatsApp Attitude Bios#

121 - Whatever you do, do it well.

122 - Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

123 - Hate comes from intimidation, love comes from appreciation.

124 - Determine your priorities and focus on them.

125 - Dream big. work hard, stay focused, and surround yourself with good people.

126 - Never Give up.

127 - When you look at me, what do you see?

128 - Take the risk or lose the chance.

129 - Life is a journey. I am a traveler.

130 - If plan A didn’t work, do not worry. Alphabet has 25 more letters.

Creative Bios for WhatsApp#

131 - Ideas are useless unless used.

132 - Be brave enough to live differently.

133 - Self-confidence is the best outfit.

134 - Be the type of person that you want to meet.

135 - Note to self: please, relax.

136 - Too lazy to think of a caption.

137 - When life gets blurry, adjust your focus.

138 - It’s kind of fun to do the impossible.

139 - Grow through what you go through.

140 -Sometimes, you have to be your own superhero.

Discover JivoChat Solution for WhatsApp#

Do you use WhatsApp for business? JivoChat can help you boost your presence through this messaging app to nurture client relationships and increase sales. You can use JivoChat to create campaigns enriched with customer data, present offers to specific audience segments, and keep your customers updated on the latest news about your products and services.

You can keep track of all WhatsApp interactions through the JivoChat app, so you won't miss any important notifications. You will also be able to create customer profiles with their previous interaction history, contact details, and agents' comments.

Choose Your Favorite Bio for WhatsApp#

Select the bio for WhatsApp that fits you best, and update your profile. You can also save some of the other phrases to change the bio from time to time, according to how you feel. Enjoy it!
